name: Combat Mechanic
description:
Combat Mechanic is a wave-defense game about taking care of your robot friends.

Each day, you will have 30 seconds to diagnose and repair as many robots as possible.

At the end of the day, your base will be attacked, and all of your repaired robots will defend you. If you ever run out of base health, it's game over!

How to Play:
  • Each robot will tell you which of its body parts need fixing.
  • Hovering over that body part will show its properties on the readout screen. 
  • Clicking a body part with one of the tools on the left will change the property corresponding to that tool. 
  • Once all the properties on the robot say "GOOD", hit the "DONE" button!
Controls:
  • Mouse to select and use tools.
  • 1-6 to hit the tools buttons quickly.
  • Spacebar to hit the "Done" button quickly.
  • Escape to return to the main menu.
